BCNV.TA.summary: Brack Capital Properties NV, a real estate company, owns and develops residential and commercial properties in Germany. Its property portfolio includes multifamily properties, retail parks, and residential development units. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Amsterdam, the Netherlands.

EPP.JO.summary: EPP N.V. operates as a real estate investment company in Poland. The company operates in two segments, Retail and Office. It acquires, develops, and leases shopping malls and offices. The company operates a portfolio of 25 retail and 6 office projects, as well as 1 retail development project with a gross lettable area of approximately 1,000,000 square meters in Warsaw. The company was formerly known as Echo Polska Properties N.V. and changed its name to EPP N.V. in May 2018. EPP N.V. was incorporated in 2016 and is based in Amsterdam, the Netherlands.
